snippet: Bahrain sentenced a leading rights activist to three years in prison on Thursday for “inciting” anti-government protests in speeches and Twitter updates.
abstract: Bahrain sentenced a leading rights activist to three years in prison on Thursday for “inciting” anti-government protests in speeches and Twitter updates.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and KAREEM FAHIM

headline.main: Bahrain Sentences Activist to 3 Years in Prison for 'Inciting' Protests
